name: StreetFighter Blog
description: THis is a streetfighter blog project I made using Django framework. It is a simple blog used to create post ad users create new post and sign in and sign out functionality. This project utilizes a database, SqLite, HTML, CSS, and made with python.

name: Task Manager
description: This is a simple task Manager that users Authentication and Crud functions for Task tracking and completion

name: GoodEats
description: This is a Restaurants that serves good food using Crud functionality and servicing Cart where you can add and delete selections
